DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effect nasal carbon dioxide treatment mild headache people migraine .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Nasal Carbon Dioxide ( CO2 ) Treatment Mild Headache People Who Experience Migraines
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , adaptively randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial evaluate efficacy safety nasal , non-inhaled administration carbon dioxide ( CO2 ) treatment mild headache . An estimated 250 patient meet eligibility criterion enrol study approximately 15 site ensure 220 patient randomize complete study .
DOC.criteria: Able read understand inform consent form voluntarily consent participate study sign IRBapproved informed consent form Established diagnosis migraine without aura per ICHDII ( patient diagnosis menstrual migraine eligible ) History 28 migraine attack per month 3 month prior randomization Have typical migraine progress distinct mild headache moderate severe migraine Able recognize mild headache could develop moderate severe migraine Have le 48 hour freedom headache attack migraine Have 15 headache day per month Are female pregnant lactating Use antipsychotic antidepressant medication ( unless migraine prophylaxis ) within 12 week prior randomization duration study Have concurrent diagnosis TMD trigeminal neuralgia require treatment Clinically significant deviate septum , nasal polyp nasal condition prevents unrestricted breathe nostril Have participate another study nasal CO2
